name: Stress (itch) (Ratima Chandrema)
description:
This game is about managing your stress under pressure. You objective is to finish the work before the day end. Or you can choose to ignore it and face the outcome. 

This project was made within 1 week as an assignment for SAE Perth. 

The game is made by Ratima Chandrema 

The 3D models which are used in this project are free assets from Unity Asset store and Itch.io Asset page. 

The background music is from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Dot_Sessions/RadioPink/In_The_Box

Other audio assets are free from https://freesound.org/browse/tags/sound-effects/
